name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Innovative Lead Sitecore Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors, leveraging strong skills in **C#**, **.NET 8**, **Azure Web Apps**, **Azure Functions**, **Azure SQL Databases**, and **Azure DevOps**. Adept in client-side and server-side programming using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Vue3**, and **React**, ensuring seamless user experiences and robust backend functionalities.
Demonstrated expertise in cloud-native deployment and orchestration on **Azure**, utilizing **Kubernetes** and **AKS**, along with implementation of CI/CD workflows to enhance development efficiency. Proficient in building responsive web applications and managing data with **Solr Cloud**.
Proven track record in compliance-driven development aligned with industry standards, fostering collaboration, communication, and leadership within agile teams. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, complemented by hands-on experience in building AI/ML solutions powered by frameworks such as **FastAPI**, **Django**, and MLOps tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
